summary:
Night Skies with or without visible Galaxies and or Auroras.
Pick and choose which you want for a more immersive experience.
Specially made for summer users.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]Realistic Night Skies[/size][/font][/b][/center]
Night Skies with or without visible Galaxies and or Auroras.
Pick and choose which you want for a more immersive experience.
Specially made for summer users.

Tropical Skyrim or Seasons of Skyrim Users: this is an alternative for your sky as there should be no visible galaxy or aurora's any where near tropical zones.
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59144-3-1413570273.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59144-5-1413570274.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59144-1-1413570334.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59144-2-1413570334.jpg[/img]

[center]              Mods to try with this for Immersion
[url=http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&sqi=2&ved=0CB4QFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F50696%2F&ei=Tbc8VL3qKsPCggSez4LQDw&usg=AFQjCNFwZ8gLX0KjzrP9V_9VLo7UUqI-TA&bvm=bv.77161500,d.eXY]Moon Glow[/url] by Isoku
 [url=http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0CB4QFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F32644%2F&ei=HLg8VM7MJceWgwT6ooGIDA&usg=AFQjCNFzDu11yyUgMx5aEnsEHuRgMm3ZVw&bvm=bv.77161500,d.eXY]Beautiful Skyrim Galaxy and Nebula Pack 2k 4k and 8k[/url] by [b]HXP
[/b][url=http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=3&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0CCsQFjAC&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F25022&ei=bbg8VNSiOMrOggSUr4DwAQ&usg=AFQjCNEyqxh4KgQREcmHBXafmZm9AbNzeA&bvm=bv.77161500,d.eXY]Shooting Stars[/url] By Isoku[/center]
[center][size=6]Installation[/size][/center]

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Pick between 1 of the 3 choices
No Galaxy
No Aurora
No Galaxy or Aurora

Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
You can find the Skyrim folder here: Programfiles(x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data

Data\textures\sky\skyrimauroralut.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimaurorastreak01.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimaurorastreak02.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimauroraswirl01.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimgalaxy.dds

[center][size=6]Uninstallation[/size][/center]Deletion

Data\textures\sky\skyrimauroralut.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimaurorastreak01.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimaurorastreak02.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimauroraswirl01.dds
Data\textures\sky\skyrimgalaxy.dds

Credits:
Krypt

Tools Used:
Paint.Net

Enjoy and endorse if you like the mod.
author: Krypt
